briefTitle: Observational Study to Evaluate Mechanisms of Aromatase Inhibitor Associated Musculoskeletal Symptoms
officialTitle: Prospective Observational Study of Breast Cancer Patients Starting Therapy With an AI to Evaluate Mechanisms Underlying Development of Aromatase Inhibitor Associated Musculoskeletal Symptoms
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Change in estradiol and development of musculoskeletal symptoms between baseline and 3 months
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Stage I-III breast cancer who are scheduled to receive endocrine therapy with an aromatase inhibitor
* All prior surgery, chemotherapy, and radiation therapy should be complete or should be completed by the time of AI treatment initiation (within 28 days of study enrollment)
* Age 21 and above and postmenopausal
